name: Anthony WALKER, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Walker v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Anthony WALKER, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of August, 1998, the order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
713 A.2d 1144
Anthony WALKER, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Decided Aug. 19, 1998.
